titleStmt.title: A sermon preached July 26, 1682, in the Cathedral Church of St. Peter in York at the assizes for that county / by James Hickson ...
titleStmt.author: Hickson, James, b. 1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Lambert, bookseller in York,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
